argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lspval.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lspval.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lspval.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lspprcl.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 5 |  | lspprcl.x | |- ( ph -> X e. V ) |
| 6 |  | lspprcl.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_prssi | |- ( ( X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> { X , Y } C_ V ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> { X , Y } C_ V ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_lspcl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ { X , Y } C_ V ) -> ( N ` { X , Y } ) e. S ) |
| 10 | 4, 8, 9 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X , Y } ) e. S ) |
